net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components

Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components.Component
      • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components.Panel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuBar

    public class Panel
extends Component
    Class that is used to contain other Components.
    Since:
    Mar 10, 2013 at 12:28:06 AM, v0.1
    Version:
    Mar 10, 2013 at 12:28:06 AM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

      Constructor and Description
      Panel(Panel parent)
      Construct a Panel that is used to hold Components with the specified parent Panel.

      • isIndependentSize

        public boolean isIndependentSize()
        Get whether or not the size of the Panel is independent to the scale that the OpenGL matrix has at the rendering time.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the size of the Panel is independent to scale at render time.

      • setIndependentSize

        public void setIndependentSize(boolean independentSize)
        Set whether or not the size of the Panel should be independent to the scale that the OpenGL matrix has at the rendering time.
        Parameters:
        independentSize - Whether or not to set the size of the Panel to be independent to scale at render time.

      • addChild

        public boolean addChild(Component child)
        Add the specified Component as a child to this Panel. This removes any previous links to parents from the child.
        Parameters:
        child - The child Component to add to this Panel.
